title: How to Make a Free Website Using Wix: Easy Guide

steps.title: Go to https://www.wix.com and click Get Started.
steps.content: Go to https://www.wix.com and click Get Started . If you already have a Wix account, click Login in the upper-right corner instead.

steps.title: Sign up for an account.
steps.content: Sign up for an account. You can do this by entering your email and desired password on the left-hand side of the screen, or you can click Continue with Google to sign up with your Google account or Continue with Facebook to sign up with your Facebook account.

steps.title: Click through Wix's introduction.
steps.content: Click through Wix's introduction. After entering your email and password, Wix will ask you a couple of questions to help gauge what type of website you're looking to make. You can click Skip in the bottom-right corner if you want to skip ahead.

steps.title: Choose whether to use Wix's AI site builder.
steps.content: Choose whether to use Wix's AI site builder. If you want to use Wix's AI site builder to begin creating your site, click Start Chat . Otherwise, click Set up without Chat . The steps in this section continue as if you choose not to use Wix's AI. To learn how to use Wix's AI chat, jump to our AI section below .

steps.title: Choose what type of website you want to make.
steps.content: Choose what type of website you want to make. You can click Skip in the bottom-right corner if you want to skip ahead.

steps.title: Pick a name for your site.
steps.content: Pick a name for your site. After finishing the intro, you can choose a name for your site. This can always be changed later, so feel free to put a placeholder or click Skip to decide a different time.

steps.title: Add any Wix apps, if desired.
steps.content: Add any Wix apps, if desired. If you picked a site type from part 1, some apps may already be selected. You can deselect them and choose different apps (or none) if you prefer. You can also click Skip to skip this part for now. Wix apps give different functionality to your site. For example, there are apps that add social media feeds, an online store, an appointment scheduler, and much more.

steps.title: Click Continue to Dashboard.
steps.content: Click Continue to Dashboard . Your account and first site are now set up, and you can begin building your site. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Look at the tasks on your dashboard.
steps.content: Look at the tasks on your dashboard. After completing setup, the first task (update your site type) will be crossed off. The next step you should complete is "Design your website." You can ignore the task that says "Connect a custom domain." To use a custom domain, you must pay for a premium Wix plan and you must purchase the domain.

steps.title: Click Design Site.
steps.content: Click Design Site . This will bring you to Wix's site design wizard.

steps.title: Decide if you want to use AI or not.
steps.content: Decide if you want to use AI or not. If you want to design the site yourself, click Pick a Template . Otherwise, click Generate a Design to use AI. The steps in this section continue as if you choose not to use Wix's AI. To learn how to use Wix's AI template generator, jump to our AI section below .

steps.title: Choose a template to start with.
steps.content: Choose a template to start with. Use the filters and dropdowns to sort through the sites, or search for templates using keywords. Once you see a template you like, hover it and click Edit .

steps.title: Decide if you want AI to generate your site text.
steps.content: Decide if you want AI to generate your site text. If you don't, click the x in the upper-right corner of the popup window when you enter the site editor. The steps in this section continue as if you choose not to use Wix's AI. To learn how to use Wix's AI text generator, jump to our AI section below .

steps.title: Familiarize yourself with the site editor.
steps.content: Familiarize yourself with the site editor. There are a number of elements on the site editor page. You can hover over most options and icons to see their name, and some options have tooltips with their uses. While it's best to take your time to get familiar with the site editor, here's a simple breakdown of the editor from the top of the page to the bottom: Top bar: The top bar has several options on both the left and right sides of the bar. The most important parts of the top bar will be the Site and Settings dropdown, as well as the Save , Preview , and Publish buttons on the right. URL bar: Under the top bar is another bar that shows the URL of your site. You can also use the Page dropdown to move to a different webpage in your website, and the icons between these two sections allow you to switch from desktop to mobile view. Left sidebar: The left-hand sidebar allows you to add elements, add sections, add pages, change your site design, add apps, manage your site business, manage your media, and go to the CMS (content management system) for your site. You can also access AI tools with the button at the bottom of the sidebar. Website editor: The main part of the screen is the website editor itself. You can drag and drop elements around the page and click on them to edit their style or content.

steps.title: Design your site.
steps.content: Design your site. Once you're familiar with the editor, you can begin editing and designing your site. All of the elements can be dragged and dropped to change where they're positioned. Double-click on any element to edit their style (such as color, font face, etc.) or content (such as text or images). Add additional elements, sections, and pages using the buttons in the left-hand sidebar.

steps.title: Save your work often.
steps.content: Save your work often. Click the Save button in the upper-right corner to save your work. Wix will also periodically autosave your work.

steps.title: Click Preview to get a preview of your site.
steps.content: Click Preview to get a preview of your site. You can view what your site looks like in a desktop or mobile browser before the site goes live.

steps.title: Click Publish to make your site go live.
steps.content: Click Publish to make your site go live. Once the site is published, you can view it by clicking View Site in the popup window, or by navigating to the URL of your website.

steps.title: Click Get Started next to "Get found on Google."
steps.content: Click Get Started next to "Get found on Google." For your website to get found, Wix offers some SEO (search engine optimization) tools. Wix also automatically generates a sitemaps XML file for your website so search engines can find it more easily. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Answer the questions in the SEO wizard.
steps.content: Answer the questions in the SEO wizard. Wix will ask for the name of your site and the keywords associated with your site. Make sure to be descriptive with your keywords, and don't include your site's name.

steps.title: Click Go for it next to the SEO checklist items.
steps.content: Click Go for it next to the SEO checklist items. You can complete the first 5 items in Step 1 and all 4 items in Step 2. Completing these steps will help your website's SEO and discoverability. To fully complete Step 1, you'll need a premium plan and a custom domain. However, you can still improve your site's SEO by following the checklist items available to free users.

steps.title: Click Start Chat during the site creation process.
steps.content: Click Start Chat during the site creation process. This will bring you to a ChatGPT-like interface where you can talk with Wix's site creation chatbot to design your site. As you answer questions, an outline of the site will appear on the right-hand side of the page. Once you're done with the chatbot, click Go to Dashboard , then click Design Site .

steps.title: Click Generate a Design during the design process.
steps.content: Click Generate a Design during the design process. The AI website designer will begin generating a template. If you don't like the template, you can click Regenerate Design or Tweak Design on the left-hand side of the page to change things. If you want to continue with the generated template, click Continue with this Design , then click Continue to the Editor .

steps.title: Enter some details about your site to make AI-generated text.
steps.content: Enter some details about your site to make AI-generated text. When you open up a non-AI generated template, Wix will prompt you to enter some details about your website to make AI-generated content for the site. To use this feature, simply fill out the information in the popup and click Generate Site Text .
